General.Name: De Rucci Healthy Sleep Co. Ltd.
General.Description: De Rucci Healthy Sleep Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of healthy sleep systems in China and internationally. It offers smart sleep, simple, blue luxury, 0769, 3D, Kaiqi, song Tiya, Kairui, New Nordic, Children, Sleep Aid, DeRUCCI HOME, Home Textiles, Mousse Sousse, Mousse Tonight, and other product series. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Dongguan, China.
